channel.title: The Library Between Worlds on By Lantern Light

item.title: The Library Between Worlds
item.description: Imagine a place between worlds, between all the plethora of realities and times that might exist in all the known universes. Somewhere (or is it somewhen?), nestled into the cracks between, built by long forgotten architects is the Great Library.
